headline: Wrongful Death Suit Tests Abbott Libre 3 And Exact Sciences Ambitions
summary: A major wrongful death lawsuit has been filed alleging defects in Abbott Laboratories' (NYSE:ABT) FreeStyle Libre 3 and Libre 3 Plus glucose monitoring systems. The claim links the products to seven deaths globally and hundreds of serious injuries among users. The suit alleges Abbott identified manufacturing problems in internal testing and did not disclose the defect until after a reported death. The case raises questions about product safety, regulatory oversight, and potential financial...
